individual.sub: Norem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.consectetur adipiscing elit
individual.understanding: I understand the criteria of individual investors.
individual.option1: I have at least AED 18.36 million in investments
individual.option2: I have between AED 8 million and 18.36 million in assets
individual.option3: I have between AED 3.67 million and 8 million in assets
individual.option4: I have over AED 735,000 income for the past 2 years
individual.philosophysub: Norem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. consectetur adipiscing elit.

philosophyGoals.objQuestion: What are your investment objectives for this portfolio?
philosophyGoals.incomeSub: Please indicate the percentage of your portfolio that needs to be liquid (i.e., Cash, Marketable securities)
philosophyGoals.reqQes: Do you require any income from this investment portfolio to take care of your expenses during the investment horizon indicated by you above?
philosophyGoals.investmentExperience: Do you have Investment Experience and Expertise?
philosophyGoals.establish: Establishes your investment experience and knowledge
philosophyGoals.uploadNecessary: Upload the necessary documents to give proof of your income.
philosophyGoals.whyToDo: Why do I need to do this?

investmentExperience.overallExp: What is your overall Investment Experience and Expertise?
investmentExperience.overallSub: Establishes your investment experience and knowledge.
investmentExperience.preference: What are your preferences to invest in types of assets?
investmentExperience.investmentCriteriaQues: What are the investment criteria in terms of guidelines, policies, restrictions, regulatory and legal constraints, or special circumstances?

investmentHorizon.investComfortable: For what time do you think you can comfortably invest a substantial part of this portfolio without the requirement of any withdrawals?
investmentHorizon.expectingReturn: What is your expected annualized return from your investment portfolio over your investment horizon?

loss.maxLoss: What is the maximum loss of the investment portfolio (within 1 year) that you can tolerate?
loss.respLossSub: In case of a loss in your investment portfolio beyond your normal tolerance level due to market fluctuations, how would you describe your most likely response?
loss.resp_opt_2: Liquidate partially and wait out in the rest of the portfolio
loss.resp_opt_3: Hold on to your investments and ride out short-term volatility in pursuit of your long-term objectives
loss.resp_opt_4: Add to your investments at the lower prices

firm.understanding: I understand the criteria of firm investors.
firm.option1: Firm has over AED 100 million in investments
firm.option2: Firm has between AED 50 million and 100 million in investment
firm.option3: Firm has between AED 10 million and 50 million in investment
firm.option4: Firm has between AED 1 million and 10 million in investment

common.attachmentPending: Your attachment is pending. Add attachments for account approval
common.uploadPic: Upload a photo of your passport.
common.uploadSelfie: Upload your Selfie with passport copy.

modal.sub_1: We have received your responses and will be updating you on your email shortly.
modal.sub_2: Please note that we will be using the information you provided to personalized your investment experience and provide you with relevant insights and recommendations.
modal.sub_3: If you need to make any changes to your information, please
modal.horizon_para_1: Modern portfolio theory (MPT) is an investment strategy based on the idea that risk-averse investors can construct portfolio to optimize or maximizing expected return for a given level of market risk, emphasizing that risk is an inherent part of higher reward.
modal.horizon_para_2: According to MPT, a portfolio frontier, also known as an efficient frontier, is a set of portfolios that maximizes expected returns for each level of standard deviation (risk). A typical portfolio frontier is illustrated below:

promptMessages.invalidEmail: You are typing Invalid email address
promptMessages.invalidFormat: This file format is not allowed
promptMessages.errorGeneral: An error occurred while performing this action
